alert.note: Alert for Espanola Valley; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Santa Fe Metro Area; Upper Rio Grande Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 11 at 2:14AM MST until January 11 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area, Upper Rio Grande Valley, Espanola Valley, and Santa Fe Metro Area. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Espanola Valley; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Santa Fe Metro Area; Upper Rio Grande Valley
